survey_name: Online Banking Security Features Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess customer satisfaction and perceptions regarding the security features of online banking platforms.

questions.question_text: How often do you use your bank's online banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover all potential usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use your bank's online banking platform?

questions.question_text: Which of the following security features are you aware of in your online banking platform? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an option for respondents unaware of any features.

script.question_text: Which of the following security features are you aware of in your online banking platform? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features offered by your online banking platform?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected at least one security feature in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the question is clear and concise.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features offered by your online banking platform?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected at least one security feature in Q2

questions.question_text: Have you ever experienced a security issue (e.g., unauthorized access, phishing attempt) with your online banking account?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Include an option for respondents who are unsure.

script.question_text: Have you ever experienced a security issue (e.g., unauthorized access, phishing attempt) with your online banking account?

questions.question_text: What additional security features would you like to see implemented in your online banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional security features would you like to see implemented in your online banking platform?
